attributes.additional_details: To save thousands of tax payers money.
attributes.background: To stop the British tax payer paying for mps second homes and all the bills accociated with the property.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk

You might wish to sign this petition on a similar matter: Review the system of expenses and allowances for MPs https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702821
